title: 3 FPS!!!
body: Yo, I need some help. My computer runs at 3 fps for League. It's not the internet's fault because my ms is only at ~60. I've tried optimizing it with Razer Cortex and everything, but the fps is still the same.

replies.body: 3 fps sounds really awful and totally unplayable.  :(  Frame drops are usually caused by bad drivers, game files, or even hardware.  It might not be your internet or connection in this case.  Instead, I recommend going over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out some possibilities while tuning up your PC.  Test it in a custom game, though!  I hope that helps!
